title: Recruiting ambitious Low-Elo players
body:
Industrial Salt is looking for  Bronze and Silver players to round out premade teams whom fall under these criteria:
    +Are available for team play several times each week, between the hours of 11a CST and 2p CST
    +Are confident playing in at least two roles
    +Can communicate effectively, either verbally or in chat
    +Must be comfortable having their gameplay recorded and analyzed in a constructive manner

Questions are enouraged!~

Thank you for your time
              {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
